pageContext.description: TYPOLOGY:  a bev. waves a little; also hints of subsidevary [sic] bevs. outside but flat-topped where intact, MANUFACTURE:  some str. around c. poss. orig., CONDITION:  most of bl e. dam. with minor chipping; some of butt breaks ook ancient, others poss. modern, ATTACHED MATERIAL:   small patch yellow ochre matrix - soil?  on bl. face
pageContext.patina: grass-olive-dark green p; patches brighter green
pageContext.surface: grass-olive-dark green p; patches brighter green textured sur. on top; v. little p. chipped to pale green ser. [] at edges/ SL hilt line preserved in surface, as well as traces of grain (wood?) in material on hilt-plate.
pageContext.other: No illustration., Different ink for GRID info; lines 1-3 of SITE info and PRFAB info., Notation in SITE info "BB. 39" in still different (black) ink.
pageContext.site: NORTH YORKSHIRE, (EAST RIDING), BUTTERWICK BB.39,, Greenwell Barrow XXXIX
pageContext.remarks: Additional Dimensions:, 1)) rivet L. 12.7; d heads 7.5-8.0, 2)) separate rivet   L.. 14.0; d. heads 8.0-8.8,  d. centre =[approx] 6.5, PRBAF:  ltrs [] for Greenwell Cat., AFI  - checkmark,  SI   -  checkmark,  CI   -  checkmark, SOURCE:  B.M.,  , LOWER RIGHT CORNER [in pencil]:, C 1
